name: Aninix - Interface animation
description:
Easily create motion design systems, export animations for promos, and provide animation inspector for developers.


---


Currently in public beta.


The goal of this plugin is to tie design system and animation together. All animation data saves directly to Figma's frames so all of your team members will have access to it.


We are on the very early stage and we would appreciate any feedback from community.


Please find detailed documentation, supported features and hotkeys at our wiki: https://www.aninix.com/wiki


Also you can find some examples at our playground.


---


Important information regarding broken import:


If you experience any import issues please select all layers in the frame -> right click -> outline stroke. This will prevent any possible unexpected issues with fonts or complex shapes.


---


FAQ


How it differentiate from other plugins?


We aim to create analogue of After Effects but a lot simpler so designers can create cool animations in a fast and handy way.

The main difference of us in render engine and viewport. With Aninix you are working in separated window and not using Figma's viewport unlike other plugins.

This feature allow us create the best UX we can provide.


Also we have cool Animation Inspector which create a new way of communication between designer and developer.

For more info please visit our wiki: https://www.aninix.com/wiki


What kind of animations I can do with this plugin?


Currently we support animations of simple components. Best it fit with development of motion-design system where you animate buttons, inputs, screen transitions etc.


You can check examples at our playground.


Does it support all features from Figma?


Currently no. You can check full list of supported features here: https://www.aninix.com/wiki/supported-figma-features

Where I can check the list of hotkeys?


Please visit: https://www.aninix.com/wiki/hotkeys.

But beware sometimes you can experience conflict with Figma's hotkeys. It happens because of focus state of the plugin. If you press any button and nothing happen then just click on empty place on timeline or in viewport so plugin will take control of hotkeys.
